```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

#Data Reading
```{r}
df <- read.csv(file="../traffic-data.csv", nrows=1000, head=TRUE, sep=",")
```

# Data Cleaning

Check for duplicate rows 
```{r}
nrow(df) - nrow(unique(df))
```

Remove Columns which has one unique value  
```{r}
df <- Filter(function(x)(length(unique(x))>2), df)
```
